name: Infuy
description:
We are a small company run 100% by technical people who love to create, discover and experiment with new technologies. We develop web and mobile applications in Java, ReactJS and nodeJS for worldwide clients. We provide the best service to our clients adapting the necessary technologies in the process. Become partners with our customers in the technology area so we can grow with them.
 
Our team of software developers and designers have been carefully selected for their exceptional talent and dedication.
 
We have been focusing in Blockchain technologies from the last 5 years. We have developed solutions using Ethereum, Bitcoin, RSK among others.
 
We are good at
Blockchain development
Web app development
Mobile app development
UI/UX Design
